name: finance-management-system
description: Finance Management System with Frontend and Backend

scripts.start: concurrently "cd Frontend && npm start" "cd finance-management-system && python manage.py runserver"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd Frontend && npm install && cd ../finance-management-system && pip install django>=5.1.6 django-cors-headers>=4.7.0 djangorestframework>=3.16.0
